title: Strange adventures of Mr. Smith
brief_description: Mr Smith (Gus McNaughton) leads a double life in order to maintain the elements of a middle-class security with his new wife (Eve Gray). However, his doubting mother-in-law embarks on a search for the truth which eventually is overtaken by various farcical situations involving Mr Smith and his alter ego. Cast includes Isobel Scaife, Michael Ripper, Bill Shine, Norma Varden, Aubrey Mallalieu.
